scenarios.name: Brake Repair Emergency
scenarios.message: My 2019 Honda Civic makes a grinding noise when I brake. It started this morning and I'm worried it's not safe to drive. Can someone look at it today?

scenarios.name: Regular Oil Change
scenarios.message: Hi, I need to schedule an oil change for my 2020 Toyota Camry. I'm flexible on timing, just sometime next week would be great.

scenarios.name: Check Engine Light
scenarios.message: Check engine light came on in my 2018 Ford F-150. Truck seems to run fine but want to get it diagnosed. What would this cost?

demo_instructions.overview: Demo scenarios for Automotive Repair Shop
how_to_test: 1. Use the provided sample messages in your demo forms
2. Show how the AI analyzes intent and urgency
3. Demonstrate similarity detection with different customers
4. Show the Airtable integration in real-time
